Created an attachment (id=22993)
Main file to open

Please open this file in VE for the exception. Another required file is
attached next.

Created an attachment (id=22994)
Required class for the main file

Please open the other attachement file with this in the same package.

The problem was that the EventHandler was not on the freeform nor was it a
property/child of some bean that was on the freeform. Because of this it was not
instantiated. The parse allocation algorithm expecting anything referenced in
the parse tree to already been instantiated. Had to change the code to try to
instantiate it if not already instantiated.

This required a big change because I had to change expression to allow
independent subexpressions to occur in the middle.
